                          +--com.heaton.bot.HTMLParse
public class HTMLParse
extends javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit

A VERY simple class meant only to subclass the HTMLEditorKit class to make the getParser method public so that we can gain access to an HTMLEditorKit.Parser object. Copyright 2001 by Jeff Heaton

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff Heaton
See Also:
Serialized Form
